thread.title_full: Beyonc√© Steps Out on Shopping Trip in Beverly Hills Before Heading to New Orleans With Jay Z

author: Lynda Brendish
title: Beyonc√© Steps Out on Shopping Trip in Beverly Hills Before Heading to New Orleans With Jay Z
text: Beyonc√© Steps Out on Shopping Trip in Beverly Hills Before Heading to New Orleans With Jay Z by Lynda Brendish 2:15 PM PST, February 19, 2017 Photo: Bruce/Javiles/4CRNS/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES Even Beyonc√© needs retail therapy! Stepping out in public for just the second time since announcing that she's pregnant with twins, Queen Bey hit up Barneys New York in Beverly Hills on Friday. The 35-year-old songstress sported a casual look for the outing, pairing white sneakers and shorts with a T-shirt from Kanye West pal Virgil Abloh's Off-White label. She also held a protective hand over her baby bump during the shopping trip. Photo: Bruce/Javiles/4CRNS/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES Photo: Bruce/Javiles/4CRNS/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES The visit to the upscale department store came just one day before the singer and her family, including husband Jay Z, daughter Blue Ivy and sister Solange Knowles , were spotted dining in New Orleans, Louisiana, where the NBA All-Star Weekend is taking place. Fans were quick to snap pics of the family indulging in some of NOLA's famous Cajun cuisine at local eatery Willa Jean on Saturday. Beyonc√©, Jay Z, Blue, Solange & Julez in New Orleans today. üíô pic.twitter.com/CDTvWRfHBW ‚Äî BEYONC√â LEGION (@Bey_Legion) February 18, 2017 Jay Z, Blue, Solange & Julez in New Orleans today. pic.twitter.com/2DeBjCLXhq ‚Äî BEYONC√â LEGION (@Bey_Legion) February 19, 2017 It was a busy weekend for Bey and fam. Jay Z was spotted hanging with New Orleans MC Jay Electronica after his concert at Preservation Hall in the French Quarter, according to Complex , where he briefly took the mic and spoke to the afterparty-goers. Jay Z attended Jay Electronica's concert last night at the historic Preservation Hall - New Orleans. TIDALXNOLA pic.twitter.com/JzXsz4bzuv ‚Äî JAY Z Daily (@JAY_Z_Daily) February 18, 2017 Jay also joined Beyonc√© and Solange at a Saint Heron party, billed on its website as a "musically botanical experience and ode to Stevie Wonder's remarkable Journey Through The Secret Life of Plants album." A post shared by Beyonc√© Daily Brasil (@beydailybr) on Feb 19, 2017 at 6:29am PST
